inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: EnvironmentUrl
inputs.label: Environment url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the environment url to reset.

inputs.name: OverrideDomainName
inputs.label: Override Domain Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to override the domain name while resetting the instance.

inputs.name: DomainName
inputs.label: Domain name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The domain name is part of the environment URL. If you enter a domain name that's already in use, then the task appends a numeric value to the domain name, starting with 0 and sets the environment URL. For example - If the domain name 'contoso' is already in use, then the environment URL will be updated to https://{contoso}0.crm.dynamics.com.

inputs.name: OverrideFriendlyName
inputs.label: Override Friendly Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to override the friendly name while resetting the instance.

inputs.name: FriendlyName
inputs.label: Display name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the display name of the reset instance.

inputs.name: WaitForEnvironmentAvailability
inputs.label: Wait for Environment Availability (OBSOLETE)
inputs.helpMarkDown: OBSOLETE: This task parameter will go away in the future. Reset Environment will always wait for completion
